solution_line_template: The total number of songs downloaded is {songs_morning} songs + {songs_later} songs + {songs_night} songs = <<{songs_morning}+{songs_later}+{songs_night}={total_songs}>>{total_songs} songs
The total size of the songs is {total_songs} songs x {memory_per_song}MB/song = <<{total_songs}*{memory_per_song}={total_memory_space}>>{total_memory_space} MB
